Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Torca/Sky Lynx/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion::

::Torca dodges all of the laser blasts.  the granade misses him, but some of 
the sonic energy hits him.  He modifies his dorsal gun to nail gun mode and 
fires 9 nails at Breakdown, 8 at Dark One, and 8 at Astral.  he sees Klant 
crawling back to him::
Torca: You alright Klant? if not, get into a CR chamber, because you look 
pretty beaten up.
::Sky Lynx flies to escape the fireballs, but one hits him anyway.  He only 
gets hit by one ion disk.  he dodges the shots from Ares.  He fired 2 missles 
from one gun at Pyro, 1 missle from the other at Manterror, and 1 missle at 
Ares.  Ratchet transformed to robot mode and escaped most of the shots, 
thoguh some hit him in the arms.  Ratchet jumped out of the way of the connon 
blast, and ended up being hit by some of Fenox's laser bolts.  He fired 15 
shots from each of his blasters at Scavenger and launched 1 explosive tusk 
blades at Sixshot, and one at Fenox.  Sideswipe escapes the sword blade.  He 
got hit by 2 stinger missles and 5 optic blasts(between Injector and 
Bumblebee). He fired 25 shots at Demon Wulf, 1 missle at Injector, and 1 
missle at Bumblebee.  Orion destroyed the missles with ones of his own and 
fired a missle, hoping to hit Double Punch.  He evaded the shots from Ares 
and fired a missle at him.  He escapes the darts and fires 25 rapid fire 
optic blasts at Starlight::

--part1_ca.e72bbd4.276fdd56_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
